<table class="clearTable">
    <tr>
        <td>`default`</td>
        <td>Library default</td>
    </tr><tr>
        <td>`hide`</td>
        <td>Hide Collection</td>
    </tr><tr>
        <td>`hide_items`</td>
        <td>Hide Items in this Collection</td>
    </tr><tr>
        <td>`show_items`</td>
        <td>Show this Collection and its Items</td>
    </tr>
</table>
